0.1.0.description:
# Okami HD APWorld 0.1.0

- First release of the apworld. Not playable yet, but will generate some spoiler logs.

- Added some base structs to describe logic

- Added logic up to Tsuta Ruins. Probably missing some checks

0.1.1.description:
# Update 0.1.1

## Logic
- Added Tsuta Ruins and Taka pass (chests only)
- Fixes for previous logic
- Added Location type for different chest types

## Options
- Added option for KTs
- Removed option to start with a divine instrument, as it's not possible to start without one
- Added option for progressive weapons
- Added option for open start instead of sperate options for various checks.
0.1.1.title: Okami HD APWorld 0.1.1

0.2.0.description:
## Logic

- Added Taka Pass, Kusa Village, Sasa Sanctuary, and Gale Shrine
- Fixes for existing logic
- Lots of changes to events for Canine Warriors

## Options 
- Added Canine Warriors Options
- Added option to remove blockheads.
0.2.0.title: Okami HD APWorld 0.2.0

0.3.0.description:
# Logic 
- Added Moon Cave (Orochi arc is finally done!)

# Options
- Added Option to bloom all guardian saplings (except the kamiki village one)
- Added Option for Moon Cave Entrance
0.3.0.title: Okami HD APWorld 0.3.0

0.3.1.description:
# Fixes
- Fixes issues for non-dev versions
0.3.1.title: Okami HD APWorld 0.3.1

0.3.2.description:
# Okami HD APWorld 0.3.2

## Locations
- Replaced some id locations with their "final" (I hope) ones.
- Hayabusa check now uses nighttime check option.
- Renamed some locations for clarity.
- Added some missing locations. 

## Options
- BuriedChestByNight has been renamed in NightTimeChecksRequireCrescent and is now a more general option for nighttime checks.

## Fixes
- Fix typos in some brush techniques names
- Fix soup ingredients items being in the wrong item table
- Internal change to simplify how logic is expressed for Moon Cave frozen chests.
